'''Mr. Bliss''' can refer to the following:
* '''''[[Mr. Bliss]]'', a story by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] published in [[1982]].'''
** [[J. Bliss]], the main character.
** [[Mr. Bliss (2004 film)|Mr. Bliss]], a 33-minute animated film released in [[2004]].
* [[Alan Bliss]], editor of ''[[Finn and Hengest: The Fragment and the Episode]]''.
